summary: This is an email from a court reporter service regarding the scheduling of a Final Pretrial Conference (FPTC) for the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell, set for the following day. The email is a request to order the transcript of the proceeding.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case referenced in the email (U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell).

events.title: Final Pretrial Conference for U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A Final Pretrial Conference (FPTC) is scheduled to take place for 4 hours beginning at 9:30 AM.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 22, 2021, concerning the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
A Final Pretrial Conference (FPTC) was scheduled for November 23, 2021, at 9:30 AM for 4 hours.
The email is from a court reporter service offering to provide a transcript of the proceeding.
